classData.comment:
/**
 * A singleton manager to track the currently running effect and control global effect execution.
 * It provides a centralized mechanism for pausing, resuming, and batching effect runs.
 * @class Neo.core.EffectManager
 * @singleton
 */
classData.description: A singleton manager to track the currently running effect and control global effect execution. It provides a centralized mechanism for pausing, resuming, and batching effect runs.
classData.name: EffectManager

classData.comment:
/**
     * A stack to keep track of the currently active effect and its predecessors.
     * @member {Neo.core.Effect[]} effectStack=[]
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: A stack to keep track of the currently active effect and its predecessors.
classData.name: effectStack

classData.comment:
/**
     * A flag to temporarily disable dependency tracking for the active effect.
     * This is used internally to prevent effects from depending on their own state, like `isRunning`.
     * @member {Boolean} isTrackingPaused=false
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: A flag to temporarily disable dependency tracking for the active effect. This is used internally to prevent effects from depending on their own state, like isRunning.
classData.name: isTrackingPaused

classData.comment:
/**
     * A counter to manage nested calls to pause() and resume(). Effect execution is
     * paused or batched while this counter is greater than 0.
     * @member {Number} pauseCounter=0
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: A counter to manage nested calls to pause() and resume(). Effect execution is paused or batched while this counter is greater than 0.
classData.name: pauseCounter

classData.comment:
/**
     * A Set to store unique effects that are triggered while the manager is paused.
     * These effects will be run when resume() is called and the pauseCounter returns to 0.
     * @member {Set<Neo.core.Effect>} queuedEffects=new Set()
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: A Set to store unique effects that are triggered while the manager is paused. These effects will be run when resume() is called and the pauseCounter returns to 0.
classData.name: queuedEffects

classData.comment:
/**
     * Adds a `Neo.core.Config` instance as a dependency for the currently active effect,
     * unless dependency tracking is explicitly paused.
     * @param {Neo.core.Config} config The config instance to add as a dependency.
     */
classData.description: Adds a Neo.core.Config instance as a dependency for the currently active effect, unless dependency tracking is explicitly paused.

params.description: The config instance to add as a dependency.
params.name: config

classData.name: addDependency

classData.description: Returns the effect currently at the top of the stack (i.e., the one currently running).
classData.name: getActiveEffect

classData.comment:
/**
     * Checks if effect execution is currently paused or batched.
     * @returns {Boolean} True if the pauseCounter is greater than 0.
     */
classData.description: Checks if effect execution is currently paused or batched.

returns.description: True if the pauseCounter is greater than 0.

classData.name: isPaused

classData.comment:
/**
     * Pauses effect execution and begins batching.
     * Each call to pause() increments a counter, allowing for nested control.
     */
classData.description: Pauses effect execution and begins batching. Each call to pause() increments a counter, allowing for nested control.
classData.name: pause

classData.comment:
/**
     * Disables dependency tracking for the currently active effect.
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Disables dependency tracking for the currently active effect.
classData.name: pauseTracking

classData.description: Pops the current effect from the stack.
classData.name: pop

classData.comment:
/**
     * Pushes an effect onto the stack.
     * @param {Neo.core.Effect} effect The effect to push.
     */
classData.name: push

classData.comment:
/**
     * Queues a unique effect to be run later.
     * @param {Neo.core.Effect} effect The effect to queue.
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Queues a unique effect to be run later.
classData.name: queue

classData.comment:
/**
     * Resumes effect execution. If the pause counter returns to zero and effects
     * have been queued, they will all be executed synchronously.
     */
classData.description: Resumes effect execution. If the pause counter returns to zero and effects have been queued, they will all be executed synchronously.
classData.name: resume

classData.comment:
/**
     * Re-enables dependency tracking for the currently active effect.
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Re-enables dependency tracking for the currently active effect.
classData.name: resumeTracking

classData.comment:
/**
     * Wraps a function in a batch operation, ensuring that all effects triggered
     * within it are run only once after the function completes.
     * @function Neo.batch
     * @param {Function} fn The function to execute.
     */
classData.description: Wraps a function in a batch operation, ensuring that all effects triggered within it are run only once after the function completes.
classData.name: batch
